articles.title: ISS astronaut gets haptic feedback from robot on Earth - Robot Report
articles.description: The European Space Agency team hopes that their research could be used to perform complex missions on the lunar surface.
articles.content:
Luca Parmitano operating a robot on Earth from the ISS. | Source: ESA
